details.title: Detection Results for Scanning Radars Employing Feedback Integration
details.abstract: A method is presented for the calculation of the detection probabilities for a scanning radar employing feedback integration. An equation is developed for the optimum feedbacd valueÂ¿ the equation holds for small and large sample sizes and for fluctuating and nonfluctuating targets. Then, a value for the antenna beam-shape factor is given which enables one to calculate detection probabilities.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
